attributes.action: BAN SMOKING IN CARS AND ALL OTHER VEHICLES.
attributes.additional_details:
BAN SMOKING IN CARS - ANYONE FOUND SMOKING IN A CAR WITH CHILDREN UNDER THE AGE OF 18 SHOULD FACE CHILD ABUSE CHARGES.

ANYONE FOUND THROWING CIGARETTE BUTTS OUT OF THEIR WINDOW SHOULD BE CHARGED WITH DANGEROUS DRIVING, AND ENDANGERING OTHER PEOPLE AND LITTERING THE ENVIRONMENT.

ANYONE FOUND LIGHTING UP OR SMOKING SHOULD HAVE MAXIMUM PENALTY.
